name: WhiteOl
whylike: Because it is a white owl
story: WhiteOl was on a journey to eat 100 mice when he did, he went back home.

name: Taco Dog
whylike: It looks like a dog in a taco costume
story: Taco Dog was just a dog when he ate 1000 tacos and became taco dog.

name: Cute Penguin
story: Cute Penguin was an egg. So when she hatched she was so cute that she was named Cute Pengin.
